input.message:
{"id":8484455,"classification":"exposed-port-incident","risk-level":"low","title":"Exposed open port","description":"The following ports have been detected on IP 11.22.33.44
Port 123
","impact-description":"Port 123: Port 123 (Network Time Protocol) can be abused to cause a denial-of-service attack and should not be exposed to the public Internet.
","mitigation":"Port 123: This port should ideally not be reachable from the public Internet and so should be firewalled off. In cases where this is not feasible, a technical compensating control could be the introduction of IP allowlisting of known IPs to prevent unauthorized access.	
","assets":[{"id":"7332ea8f-cfbf-4bcf-8a1b-3b0991258dac"}],"raised":"2022-03-15T19:16:06.981Z","updated":"2022-03-15T19:16:06.981Z"}

digital_shadows_searchlight.description:
The following ports have been detected on IP 11.22.33.44
Port 123
digital_shadows_searchlight.impact_description: Port 123: Port 123 (Network Time Protocol) can be abused to cause a denial-of-service attack and should not be exposed to the public Internet.
digital_shadows_searchlight.mitigation: Port 123: This port should ideally not be reachable from the public Internet and so should be firewalled off. In cases where this is not feasible, a technical compensating control could be the introduction of IP allowlisting of known IPs to prevent unauthorized access.
